body_html:
After reviewing internal policy, I decided to use my personal email instead
of @microsoft.com address because I did this not for my work. I'll sign
this when I come back to home.

Thanks,
Jiin

On Fri, Sep 9, 2016 at 3:43 AM, Daniel W Mane notifications@github.com
wrote:

I believe that Microsoft is already covered under a Google CLA. You may
need to switch the commit author email in the git log to your
microsoft.com email address.

—

body:
After reviewing internal policy, I decided to use my personal email instead
of @microsoft.com address because I did this not for my work. I'll sign
this when I come back to home.

Thanks,
Jiin
